DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate long-term safety intraocular pressure-lowering efficacy DE-117 ophthalmic solution monotherapy concomitant use DE-117 ophthalmic solution timolol ophthalmic solution 0.5 % patient open angle glaucoma ocular hypertension .
DOC.brief_title: A Long-term Study DE-117 Ophthalmic Solution Monotherapy Concomitant Use DE-117 Ophthalmic Solution With Timolol Ophthalmic Solution Patients With OAG OH : RENGE Study
DOC.criteria: Patients open angle glaucoma ocular hypertension Patients risk progression visual field loss Patients severe visual field defect Patients diseases preclude participation study safety reason
